price: Онон, ки закот намепардозанд ва охиратро инкор мекунанд
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
